name: udagram-microservices
description: Udagram microservices project with Node.js backends and Angular frontend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd udagram-api-feed && npm install && cd ../udagram-api-user && npm install && cd ../udagram-frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:feed && npm run build:user && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:feed" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:feed" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:feed && npm run test:user && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd udagram-api-feed && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../udagram-api-user && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../udagram-frontend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: Fernando Barroso
